scope: Develop a terminal-based notepad application using the textual library. The application should feature a TUI with: a sidebar listing all notes, a main editor pane for syntax-free text editing, keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+N new, Ctrl+S save, Ctrl+D delete), notes persisted to a JSON file with title/body/timestamps. The UI should have a dark theme and be responsive to terminal resizing.

tasks.title: Tests for responsive layout adjustments
tasks.description: Write tests to verify that the UI adjusts correctly when resized. Use Textual's testing utilities to simulate terminal size changes and check widget positions.

tasks.title: Tests for keyboard shortcut actions
tasks.description: Write tests to verify that the new, save, and delete keyboard shortcuts work as expected. Use Textual's testing utilities to simulate key presses and check application state.

tasks.title: Final integration and cleanup
tasks.description: Integrate all components, ensure there are no conflicts or missing functionalities. Clean up any unused code or imports. Prepare the final version for deployment.
